# replace comma delimiter with rarer cha: # Special attacks -- go through MM glossary and make sure these are all defined correctly above/below!

Swallow Whole (Ex): if start turn w/ opponent up to one size smaller held in mouth, grapple check (pin) to swallow and bite opponent. {take <dmg1> in stomach}, interior AC is {10+NA/2}; <dmg2> to escape. Gullet can hold <???> creatures.
Disease (Ex): <infection>, Fort DC <save1> neg; incubation period <time1>; damage <dmg1>
Ferocity (Ex): fight without penalty while disabled or dying
Improved Grab (Ex): hit with <atk1>, auto-damage on grapple with <atk2>
Trip (Ex): hit with <atk1>, attempt to trip ({BAB+max(STR,DEX)}) as free action w/o touch atk or AoO, no counter-trip
Pounce (Ex): on charging a foe, make a full attack, including rake attacks when available
Constrict (Ex): deal <dmg1> on successful grapple check
Powerful Charge (Ex): attack deals <dmg1> on charge, in addition to normal benefits & hazards
Rage (Ex): take dmg in combat, fly into berserk rage until it or opponent is dead. gain +4Str/+4Con/-2AC. cannot end voluntarily
Rend (Ex): hit with both <atk1> to automatically deal extra <dmg1> dmg.

Attach (Ex): if hit with <atk1>, latch on and automatically deal <atk1> dmg each round it is attached. <creature> loses Dexterity bonus to AC, can be struck with weapon or grappled itself. to remove attached <creature> via grappling, opponent must pin creature.
